conversionText: Enter promo code TRADINGGAME25 in the deposit section, add a minimum deposit of 4500 Rs and get a chance to win DARAZ $100 certificate!
brotherChatText1: Majid, hey! Do you remember you promised to buy us PSL season pass for my birthday? Well, the sale ends soon...
brotherChatText2: Hey, bro! Yes, I remember it. I'm a little short of money, but I know what to do.
afterChat1: Hey, it's Rajab Butt! Didn't expect to see me here? I know you want to buy a PSL season ticket but you don't have enough money, right? I'll tell you how you can make some money.
afterChat2: We are on Binomo website! Binomo is a high-end trading platform with a wide range of financial assets.
afterChat3: Yes! Trade amount starting from 3000Rs so you won't lose a large amount of funds while you're still learning how to trade.
educationGraphText1: You have to predict whether the graph will go up or down
wrongText: No, you are wrong! But I have some advice on how to trade.
wrongButton: And what I have to do?
educationText: I advise you to trade not just like that, but based on economic data. Binomo has a calendar for tracking important reports.
educationGraphickThirdText: Well done! Now you can make a deal yourself.
secondChatText1: Bro, I've earned money on trading! Now I can buy PSL pass for us!
secondChatText2: Wow, I'm so glad! You are the best brother in the world!
gameStartText: Great! Now let's make a photo together
uploadImageTitle: Take a photo with Rajab butt
